Package silverlib.img

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • silverlib.img.Img
      • silverlib.img.Scene

  • public class Scene
extends Img
    A scene in a Movie that represents an Img object with multiple layers of Shape objects.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Jake Trimble

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Scene​(int w, int h, java.awt.Color back)
      Creates a Scene object with a given width, height, and background color.
      Scene​(int w, int h, java.awt.Color back, java.util.ArrayList<Shape> l)
      Creates a Scene object with a given width, height, background color, and predefined list of Shapes.
